Description: Pale-red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, with remains of three lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior, thickly painted.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51647) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51647)
Wangstedt 1968 / Demotische Steuerquittungen aus ptolemäischer Zeit (p. 50, no. 28.)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
